## Stuff

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)

mystery_animal <- read_csv(here::here("Week 9", "Practice Activity Stuff", "mystery_animal.csv"))
```

```{r}
mystery_lm <- lm(weight_after ~ weight_before, data=mystery_animal)
```

```{r}
mystery_lm$residuals |>
  head(5)

resid(mystery_lm) |>
  head(5)

broom::augment(mystery_lm)
```

```{r}
mystery_lm |>
  broom::augment() |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = .fitted, y = .resid)) +
  geom_point()
```
